breakpoint.html.title: Breakpoint
breakpoint.html.contents: @function is-first-breakpoint() Check if a breakpoint is the first in the list Parameters & Return $name: (String) Breakpoint name $breakpoints: $mq-breakpoints (Map) Map of breakpoints @return (Boolean) True if the passed breakpoint is the first in the list @mixin loop-breakpoints() Loop all breakpoints and output @content Parameters $breakpoints: $mq-breakpoints (Map) Map of breakpoints $inclusive: true (Bool) Outputs inclusive media queries (only min-width) if true $mq: true (Bool) Outputs media queries if true @function is-last-breakpoint() Check if a breakpoint is the last in the list Parameters & Return $name: (String) Breakpoint name $breakpoints: $mq-breakpoints (Map) Map of breakpoints @return (Boolean) True if the passed breakpoint is the last in the list @function get-next-breakpoint() Get the next breakpoint from a map Parameters & Return $name: (String) Current breakpoint name $breakpoints: $mq-breakpoints (Map) Map of breakpoints @return (String) Next breakpoint name @mixin skip-first-breakpoint() Output content in a media query excluding the first breakpoint Parameters $breakpoint: (String) Named breakpoint key of $mq-breakpoints @mixin hidpi() Target HiDPI screens Parameters $ratio: 1.5 (Number) Screen resolution ratio

button.html.title: Button
button.html.contents: @mixin button-unstyled() Remove browser default styles from <button> @mixin button-base() Generate button base styles Parameters $padding-vertical: $button-padding-vertical (Number) $padding-horizontal: $button-padding-horizontal (Number) $border-width: $button-border-width (Number) $border-radius: $button-border-radius (Number) $transition: $button-transition (List) $type: $button-type (String) @mixin button() Generate styles for a single button variation Parameters $variation: 'base' (String) Map key of $button-variations Example html <button type="button" class="button">Button</button> @mixin button-variations() Generate button variation styles Parameters $variations: $button-variations (Map) Map of button variations

global.html.title: Global
global.html.contents: @mixin aspect-ratio() Create an aspect ratio box with optional support for dynamic growing content Parameters $ratio: (String|List) Map key of the $ratios map or a list formatted as x by y $grow: false (Bool) Enables dynamic growing of the container if true @mixin clearfix() Micro clearfix @mixin fade-in() Accessible fade in transition Parameters $duration: get-duration() (Number) Default duration token @mixin fade-out() Accessible fade out transition Parameters $duration: get-duration() (Number) Default duration token @mixin font-smoothing() Enable or disable font smoothing Parameters $enabled: 'true' (Bool) Activates font smoothing if true @function get-icon() Get an icon from the $icons map in the specified color Parameters & Return $icon: (String) Map key of $icons $color: $color-icon (String) Hex color value @return (String) Encoded SVG icon string Example scss .component { background-image: url(get-icon('radio', #fff)); } css compiled .component { background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf8,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='8' height='8' viewBox='0 0 8 8'%3E%3Cpath fill='%23fff' d='M4 1C2.3 1 1 2.3 1 4s1.3 3 3 3 3-1.3 3-3S5.7 1 4 1z'/%3E%3C/svg%3E"); } @function ratio-to-percentage() Convert an aspect ratio to a percentage value Parameters & Return $ratio: (String) Aspect ratio formatted as x by y @return (Number) Percentage value @function shade-color() Slightly darken a color Parameters & Return $color: (Color) color to shade $percentage: (Number) percentage of $color in returned color @return (Color) Shaded color Example scss .component { color: shade-color(#bada55, 20%); } css compiled .component { color: #95ae44; } @function str-replace() Replace $search with $replace in $string Parameters & Return $string: (String) Initial string $search: (String) Substring to replace $replace: '' (String) New value @return (String) Replaced string @function tint-color() Slightly lighten a color Parameters & Return $color: (Color) color to tint $percentage: (Number) percentage of $color in returned color @return (Color) Tinted color Example scss .component { color: tint-color(#bada55, 20%); } css compiled .component { color: #c8e177; } @mixin triangle() CSS only triangle icon (adapted from bourbon) Parameters $direction: (String) One of ‘up’, ‘up-right’, ‘right’, ‘down-right’, ‘down’, ‘down-left’, ‘left’ or ‘up-left’ $width: (Number) $height: (Number) $color: currentColor (String|Color) @mixin underline() Beautiful underline with control over text spacing Parameters $color: currentColor (String|Color) Color of the underline $distance: 0 (Number) Distance from the text $width: 100% (Number) Width of the underline $height: 1px (Number) Thickness of the underline @function strip-unit() Remove the unit of a length Parameters & Return $number: (Number) Number to remove unit from @return (Number) Unitless number @function to-rem() Convert a value to rem Parameters & Return $value: (Number) Value to be converted $base: 16px (Number) Base font size @return (Number) Rem value Example scss .component { font-size: to-rem(20px); } css compiled .component { font-size: 1.25rem; } @function to-em() Convert a value to em Parameters & Return $value: (Number) Value to be converted $base: 16px (Number) Base font size @return (Number) Em value Example scss .component { padding-bottom: to-em(20px); } css compiled .component { padding-bottom: 1.25em; }

grid.html.title: Grid
grid.html.contents: @mixin container() Output a centered container with gutters Parameters $gutter: $grid-container-gutter (Number|Map) The amount of gutter as number, breakpoint map (xs: 30px, md: 60px) or sizing map (min: 30px, max: 60px) $width: $grid-container (Number) Maximum width of the container @mixin column-base() Output flex column base styles with gutter Parameters $gutter: $grid-gutter (Number|Map) The amount of gutter as number, breakpoint map (xs: 30px, md: 60px) or sizing map (min: 30px, max: 60px) $size: 100% (Number) Width of the column as number $columns: $grid-columns (Number) Number of grid columns @mixin column() Output flex column width modifier styles Parameters $size: 'expand' (Number|String) Column size as number (e.g. 20% or 0.2) or string (‘expand’ or ‘shrink’) $columns: $grid-columns (Number) Number of grid columns @mixin column-push() Output flex column push styles Parameters $size: (Number) Column size as number of columns $columns: $grid-columns (Number) Number of grid columns @mixin column-pull() Output flex column pull styles Parameters $size: (Number) Column size as number of columns $columns: $grid-columns (Number) Number of grid columns @mixin column-offset() Output flex column offset styles Parameters $size: (Number) Column size as number of columns $columns: $grid-columns (Number) Number of grid columns @mixin loop-columns() Parameters $breakpoint: (String) Breakpoint name $pull: $grid-pull-class (Boolean) Outputs column pull class if true $push: $grid-push-class (Boolean) Outputs column push class if true $offset: $grid-offset-class (Boolean) Outputs column offset class if true @mixin row() Output a flex grid row with gutters Parameters $gutter: $grid-gutter (Number|Map) The amount of gutter as number, breakpoint map (xs: 30px, md: 60px) or sizing map (min: 30px, max: 60px) @mixin grid-row-auto() Output a css grid row with auto fit sizing and gutters Parameters $gutter: $grid-gutter (Number|Map) The amount of gutter as number, breakpoint map (xs: 30px, md: 60px) or sizing map (min: 30px, max: 60px) $min-size: (Number) Minimum size of the grid columns Example scss .grid-row-auto { @include grid-row-auto(320px); } css compiled .grid-row-auto { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(min(100%, var(--min, 320px)), 1fr)); gap: 1.875rem; } @mixin grid-row() Output a css grid row with gutters Parameters $gutter: $grid-gutter (Number|Map) The amount of gutter as number, breakpoint map (xs: 30px, md: 60px) or sizing map (min: 30px, max: 60px) Example scss .grid-row { @include grid-row(); } css compiled .grid-row { display: grid; grid-template-rows: repeat(var(--rows, 1), 1fr); grid-template-columns: repeat(var(--columns, 12), 1fr); gap: 1.875rem; } @mixin grid-column() Output a css grid column Parameters $span: (Number) Grid column span $columns: $grid-columns (Number) Number of grid columns Example scss .grid-column { @include grid-column(6); } css compiled .grid-column { grid-column: auto/span 6; } @mixin grid-column-offset() Output a css grid column start offset Parameters $span: (Number) Grid column start offset Example scss .grid-column-offset { @include grid-column-offset(2); } css compiled .grid-column-offset { grid-column-start: 2; } @mixin gutter() Output margin or padding gutter depending on the type Parameters $gutter: $grid-gutter (Number|Map) The amount of gutter as a number or sizing map formatted as (min: 30px, max: 60px) $prop: 'gap' (String) Property to use for the gutter (‘gap’, ‘margin’ or ‘padding’) @mixin make-gutters() Wrapper for gutter mixin for switching between a gutter number or map Parameters $gutter: $grid-gutter (Number|Map) The amount of gutter as number, breakpoint map (xs: 30px, md: 60px) or sizing map (min: 30px, max: 60px) $prop: 'gap' (String) Property to use for the gutter (‘gap’, ‘margin’ or ‘padding’)

index.html.title: @zeix/ueli Documentation
index.html.contents:
ueli CSS Framework from Zeix Installation npm: npm i @zeix/ueli Sass Import ueli’s source files in your main.scss. // main.scss // 1. Include functions first (allows usage of to-rem or get-color in settings) @import '../node_modules/@zeix/ueli/scss/01-tools/functions'; // 2. Add token and variable overrides here // 3. Include remainder of required partials @import '../node_modules/@zeix/ueli/scss/00-settings/tokens'; @import '../node_modules/@zeix/ueli/scss/00-settings/variables'; @import '../node_modules/@zeix/ueli/scss/01-tools/mixins'; // 4. Include any optional parts of ueli as needed @import '../node_modules/@zeix/ueli/scss/02-generic'; @import '../node_modules/@zeix/ueli/scss/03-elements'; @import '../node_modules/@zeix/ueli/scss/04-objects'; @import '../node_modules/@zeix/ueli/scss/05-components'; @import '../node_modules/@zeix/ueli/scss/06-utilities'; // 5. Add your custom styles here NPM Scripts Command Description npm run build Build project in development mode npm run watch Watch files and build in development mode npm run serve Serve project in development mode npm run prod Build project in production mode npm run lint Run stylelint and fix errors npm run prettier Reformat files with prettier npm run sassdoc Generate sassdoc files Folder Structure The folder structure inside the scss folder is based on Harry Robert’s ITCSS. ├── 00-settings # Variables ├── 01-tools # Functions and mixins ├── 02-generic # Normalization styles ├── 03-elements # Styles for bare HTML elements (h1, input, etc.) ├── 04-objects # Class-based selectors for undecorated patterns ├── 05-components # Specific UI components ├── 06-utilities # Helper classes Settings Settings are split into tokens and variables. Tools Functions and mixins are annotated using sassdoc syntax. Please refer to the sassdoc page for their documentation. Objects Container
Related variables: $grid-container, $grid-container-gutter Flex Grid
Enable more grid classes using the $grid-*-classes variables or use the flex grid and grid mixins to build your own. Basic

list.html.title: List
list.html.contents: @mixin list-inline() Generate styles for an inline list Parameters $spacing: 1rem (Number|String) The amount of space between list items as a number or map key of $token-spacings. Beware that large spacing values can affect the clickability of nearby elements in some cases. $center: false (Bool) Centers the list if true $child-selector: 'li' (String) Any valid CSS selector @mixin list-unstyled() Remove default styles from lists (ul, ol)

sass-mq.html.title: Sass MQ
sass-mq.html.contents: $mq-base-font-size (Number (unit)) [private -- deprecated] scss $mq-base-font-size: 16px !default; Base font size on the <body> element Do not override this value, or things will break DEPRECATED: This setting will be removed in sass-mq v6.0.0 Related https://github.com/sass-mq/sass-mq/issues/122 [external] Used By @function mq-px2em() $mq-responsive (Boolean) scss $mq-responsive: true !default; Responsive mode Set to false to enable support for browsers that do not support media queries, (IE <= 8, Firefox <= 3, Opera <= 9) You could create a stylesheet served exclusively to older browsers, where media queries are rasterized Example scss // old-ie.scss $mq-responsive: false; media queries in this file will be rasterized up to $mq-static-breakpoint // larger breakpoints will be ignored Related Disabled responsive mode documentation [external] $mq-breakpoints (Map) scss $mq-breakpoints: ( mobile: 320px, tablet: 740px, desktop: 980px, wide: 1300px, ) !default; Breakpoint list Name your breakpoints in a way that creates a ubiquitous language across team members. It will improve communication between stakeholders, designers, developers, and testers. Related Full documentation and examples [external] Used By @function mq-get-breakpoint-width() @mixin mq() @mixin mq-add-breakpoint() @mixin mq-show-breakpoints() $mq-static-breakpoint (String) scss $mq-static-breakpoint: desktop !default; Static breakpoint (for fixed-width layouts) Define the breakpoint from $mq-breakpoints that should be used as the target width for the fixed-width layout (i.e. when $mq-responsive is set to ‘false’) in a old-ie.scss Example scss // tablet-only.scss // // Ignore all styles above tablet breakpoint, // and fix the styles (such as the layout) at tablet width $mq-responsive: false; $mq-static-breakpoint: tablet; media queries in this file will be rasterized up to tablet // larger breakpoints will be ignored Related Full documentation and examples [external] Used By @mixin mq() $mq-show-breakpoints (map) scss $mq-show-breakpoints: () !default; Show breakpoints in the top right corner If you want to display the currently active breakpoint in the top right corner of your site during development, add the breakpoints to this list, ordered by width. For example: (mobile, tablet, desktop). Example scss $mq-show-breakpoints: (mobile, tablet, desktop); @import 'path/to/mq'; Used By @mixin mq-show-breakpoints() $mq-media-type (String) scss $mq-media-type: all !default; Customize the media type (for example: @media screen or @media print) By default sass-mq uses an “all” media type (@media all and …) Related Full documentation and examples [external] Used By @mixin mq() @function mq-px2em() Convert pixels to ems Parameters & Return $px: (Number) value to convert @return (Number) Example scss $font-size-in-ems: mq-px2em(16px); p { font-size: mq-px2em(16px); } css compiled p { font-size: 1em; } Requires $mq-base-font-size (Number (unit)) [private] Used By @mixin mq() @function mq-get-breakpoint-width() Get a breakpoint’s width Parameters & Return $name: (String) Name of the breakpoint. One of $mq-breakpoints @return (Number) Value in pixels Example scss $tablet-width: mq-get-breakpoint-width(tablet); @media (min-width: mq-get-breakpoint-width(desktop)) {} Requires $mq-breakpoints (Map) Used By @mixin mq() @mixin mq() Media Query mixin Parameters $from: false (String | Boolean) One of $mq-breakpoints $until: false (String | Boolean) One of $mq-breakpoints $and: false (String | Boolean) Additional media query parameters $media-type: $mq-media-type (String) Media type: screen, print… @content (code block) styling rules, wrapped into a media query when $responsive is true Example scss .element { @include mq($from: mobile) { color: red; } @include mq($until: tablet) { color: blue; } @include mq(mobile, tablet) { color: green; } @include mq($from: tablet, $and: '(orientation: landscape)') { color: teal; } @include mq(950px) { color: hotpink; } @include mq(tablet, $media-type: screen) { color: hotpink; } // Advanced use: $my-breakpoints: (L: 900px, XL: 1200px); @include mq(L, $breakpoints: $my-breakpoints, $static-breakpoint: L) { color: hotpink; } } Related Full documentation and examples [external] Requires $mq-media-type (String) $mq-breakpoints (Map) $mq-static-breakpoint (String) @function mq-px2em() @function mq-get-breakpoint-width() @function _mq-quick-sort() [private] Quick sort Author: Sam Richards Parameters & Return $list: (List) List to sort @return (List) Sorted List @function _mq-map-sort-by-value() [private] Sort a map by values (works with numbers only) Parameters & Return $map: (Map) Map to sort @return (Map) Map sorted by value @mixin mq-add-breakpoint() Add a breakpoint Parameters $name: (String) Name of the breakpoint $width: (Number) Width of the breakpoint Example scss @include mq-add-breakpoint(tvscreen, 1920px); @include mq(tvscreen) {} Requires $mq-breakpoints (Map) @mixin mq-show-breakpoints() Show the active breakpoint in the top right corner of the viewport Parameters $show-breakpoints: $mq-show-breakpoints (List) List of breakpoints to show in the top right corner $breakpoints: $mq-breakpoints (Map) Breakpoint names and sizes Example scss // Show breakpoints using global settings @include mq-show-breakpoints; // Show breakpoints using custom settings @include mq-show-breakpoints((L, XL), (S: 300px, L: 800px, XL: 1200px)); css compiled @charset "UTF-8"; body::before { background-color: #fcf8e3; border-bottom: 1px solid #fbeed5; border-left: 1px solid #fbeed5; color: #c09853; font: small-caption; padding: 3px 6px; pointer-events: none; position: fixed; right: 0; top: 0; z-index: 100; } body::before { background-color: #fcf8e3; border-bottom: 1px solid #fbeed5; border-left: 1px solid #fbeed5; color: #c09853; font: small-caption; padding: 3px 6px; pointer-events: none; position: fixed; right: 0; top: 0; z-index: 100; } @media (min-width: 50em) { body::before { content: "L ≥ 800px (50em)"; } } @media (min-width: 75em) { body::before { content: "XL ≥ 1200px (75em)"; } } Related https://github.com/sass-mq/sass-mq#seeing-the-currently-active-breakpoint [external] Requires $mq-breakpoints (Map) $mq-show-breakpoints (map)

sizing.html.title: Poly Fluid / Sizing
sizing.html.contents: @mixin fluid-calc() Generate min, max and fluid in-between values for a given CSS property Parameters $prop: (String) Any CSS property that supports calc as a value $sizes: (Map|Number|List) Map of two sizes formatted as (min: x, max: y), list of two sizes formatted as (x, y) or just a number (min size) $breakpoints: $fluid-breakpoints (Map) Map of two named breakpoints from $mq-breakpoints formatted as (min: md, max: lg) or custom px values formatted as (min: 600px, max: 900px) $negative: false (Bool) Negates the values if true $important: false (Bool) Adds important flag if true $current-breakpoint: null (String) $all-breakpoints: null (List) @function is-sizing-map() Validate a sizing map Parameters & Return $map: (Map) Map to test @return (Boolean) True if the parameter is a map with a min key @function get-largest-sizing() Get largest sizing of sizing map Parameters & Return $sizing: (Map|Number) Sizing map or number @return (Number) Largest sizing in the map @function get-half-sizing() Half values of a sizing map Parameters & Return $sizing: (Map|Number) Sizing map or number @return (Map|Number) Sizing map with halved values or halved number

token.html.title: Token
token.html.contents: @function get-color() Get a color from the $token-colors map Parameters & Return $name: (String) Map key of $token-colors @return (Color) color value Example scss .component { color: get-color(black); } css compiled .component { color: #000; } @function get-duration() Get an duration value from the $token-durations map Parameters & Return $name: $token-durations-default (String) Map key of $token-durations @return (Number) duration value Example scss .component { transition: color get-duration() get-easing(); } css compiled .component { transition: color 150ms ease; } @function get-easing() Get an easing value from the $token-easings map Parameters & Return $name: $token-easings-default (String) Map key of $token-easings @return (String) easing value Example scss .component { transition: color get-duration() get-easing(); } css compiled .component { transition: color 150ms ease; } @function get-index() Get a z-index value from the $layers map Parameters & Return $name: (String) Map key of $layers @return (Number) z-index value Example scss .component { z-index: get-index(below); } css compiled .component { z-index: -1; } @function get-spacing() Get a single spacing value from the map $token-spacings Parameters $name: $token-spacings-default (String) Map key of $token-spacings $sizing: 'min' (Bool) Sizing type ‘min’ or ‘max’ @mixin spacing() Wrapper mixin for fluid-calc that gets spacings from the map $token-spacings Parameters $prop: (String) Any CSS property that supports calc as a value $sizes: $token-spacings-default (Map|Number|List|String) Map key of $token-spacings, map of two sizes formatted as (min: x, max: y), list of two sizes formatted as (x, y) or just a number (min size) $breakpoints: (Map) Map of two named breakpoints from $mq-breakpoints formatted as (md, lg) or custom px values formatted as (min: 600px, max: 900px) $negative: false (Bool) Negates the values if true $important: false (Bool) Adds important flag if true $token-colors scss $token-colors: ( blue: #0275d8, white: #fff, black: #000, gray-100: tint-color(#000, 90%), gray-200: tint-color(#000, 80%), gray-300: tint-color(#000, 70%), gray-400: tint-color(#000, 60%), gray-500: tint-color(#000, 50%), gray-600: tint-color(#000, 40%), gray-700: tint-color(#000, 30%), gray-800: tint-color(#000, 20%), gray-900: tint-color(#000, 10%), ) !default; Color Previews blue #0275d8 rgb(2, 117, 216) hsl(208, 98%, 43%) white #ffffff rgb(255, 255, 255) hsl(0, 0%, 100%) black #000000 rgb(0, 0, 0) hsl(0, 0%, 0%) gray-100 #e6e6e6 rgb(230, 230, 230) hsl(0, 0%, 90%) gray-200 #cccccc rgb(204, 204, 204) hsl(0, 0%, 80%) gray-300 #b3b3b3 rgb(179, 179, 179) hsl(0, 0%, 70%) gray-400 #999999 rgb(153, 153, 153) hsl(0, 0%, 60%) gray-500 #808080 rgb(128, 128, 128) hsl(0, 0%, 50%) gray-600 #666666 rgb(102, 102, 102) hsl(0, 0%, 40%) gray-700 #4d4d4d rgb(77, 77, 77) hsl(0, 0%, 30%) gray-800 #333333 rgb(51, 51, 51) hsl(0, 0%, 20%) gray-900 #1a1a1a rgb(26, 26, 26) hsl(0, 0%, 10%) $token-spacings scss $token-spacings: ( default: 24px, medium: 48px, large: 72px, ) !default; Size Previews $mq-breakpoints scss $mq-breakpoints: ( xs: 0px, sm: 600px, md: 900px, lg: 1200px, xl: 1500px, ) !default; Size Previews $ratios scss $ratios: ( widescreen: 16 by 9, ) !default; Ratio widescreen (0.5625) @mixin type() Wrapper mixin for use-variation that uses the $token-type map as default lookup map Parameters $variation: 'default' (String) Map key of $token-type

typography.html.title: Typography
typography.html.contents: @function modular-scale() Scale value according to the passed exponent and type scale Parameters & Return $exp: (Number) Exponent $size: $font-size-base (Number) Size to scale $type-scale: $type-scale (Number) Type scale (e.g 1.2) @return (Number) Scaled value @mixin scale-headings() Scale headings using modular scale Parameters $scale: $type-scale-base (Number) $headings: $headings (List)

utilities.html.title: Utilities
utilities.html.contents: @mixin sr-only() Hide content accessibly @mixin sr-only-reset() Undo styles from sr-only @mixin sr-only-focusable() Undo styles from sr-only when element is activated or focused @mixin text-hide() Old school way of hiding text. Better use sr-only with an additional <span> @mixin text-truncate() Truncate text using ellipsis (single-line) @mixin text-hyphenate() Activate hyphenation with fallbacks. Make sure to set the lang attribute on the <html> tag.

variation.html.title: Variations
variation.html.contents: @mixin loop-variation() Loop keys of a variation to output normal and fluid props Parameters $config: (Map) Map of Breakpoints, CSS properties and sizing maps $prop: null (String) Any CSS property $negative: false (Bool) Negates the values if true $important: false (Bool) Adds important flag if true @mixin output-props() Output CSS properties and resolve selectors key or sizing map Parameters $key: (String) $value: (String|Number|Color|Map) @mixin use-variation() Generate output for a config variation (e.g button or type) Parameters $variation-map: (Map) $variation: (String)
